# Welcome to Clovyr

Our tools provide

one-click deployment

to app publishers

learn more

Clovyr provides clean and accessible UI that helps users run apps, and a
custom VSCode environment for contributing developers.

What is Clovyr?

Clovyr is a company dedicated to building friendly, flexible tools that bring
the usability of modern applications to decentralized alternatives. We
prioritize privacy, security, and choice, without compromising convenience and
user experience.
